Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: For the price I paid, the picture is great, the sound good, very easy to set up and use, and as a bonus, is picking up channels I'm not getting from my other TV that has a cable box.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY INSIGNIA!
Reviews.Author: Admac
Reviews.Content: Three years ago we purchased an Insignia DVD player. Now it is outdated and will not play new Blu rays . We called Insignia regarding this, and they said tough luck. One manager went as far as you say the customer is always wrong. Please spread the word on this share this with everyone you know. I can't believe a company would be so awful. After 3 years a Blu ray player will not work on new movies anymore . That is ridiculous not to mention it's environmentally harmful to make an electronic that will only last three years ! Please share this with everyone. Do not buy Insignia!

ProductInfo.Features:
23-5/8" screen measured diagonally from corner to corner For optimal viewing in medium-size rooms.
2000:1 contrast ratio Along with 250 cd/m² brightness and an 8.5 ms response time for an arresting viewing experience.
Two 3W speakers For a lush soundscape.
Inputs Include 2 HDMI (rear), 1 DVI (rear), 1 PC (rear), one 3.5mm PC/DVI audio (rear), 1 component video (rear), 1 composite (rear) and 1 component/composite shared audio
Useful additional features Include channel labeling and a sleep timer.
ProductInfo.Name: Insignia NS-24L120A13 - 24" Class - LCD - 720p - 60Hz - HDTV
